casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Alvin WALKER, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Albert Walker, et al. No. 13-1193. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 734 F.3d 1278.

Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
